title: Starting a LF team
body:
I am a s6 plat player, looking to increase my skills in s7. Currently g2 in flex and g5 in solo duo. Looking to start a premade flex team to climb the ranks. 
If you have a mic it would be helpful but not required. Non toxic player, looking to improve myself through team play.
IGN: HungLowe 

Send me a friend request and we will go from there.
